"use client" import { useAuth } from "../../contexts/AuthContext" const GameStats = () => { const { user } = useAuth() const stats = user?.stats || { gamesPlayed: 0, timesTagged: 0, timesBeenTagged: 0, totalScore: 0, } const statCards = [ { label: "Total Score", value: stats.totalScore, icon: "‚≠ê", color: "bg-yellow-50 border-yellow-200 text-yellow-700", }, { label: "Games Played", value: stats.gamesPlayed, icon: "üéÆ", color: "bg-blue-50 border-blue-200 text-blue-700", }, { label: "Times Tagged", value: stats.timesTagged, icon: "üéØ", color: "bg-green-50 border-green-200 text-green-700", }, { label: "Times Been Tagged", value: stats.timesBeenTagged, icon: "üòÖ", color: "bg-red-50 border-red-200 text-red-700", }, ] return (
{user?.avatar || "üëß"}

{user?.username}'s Stats

{statCards.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.icon}
{stat.value}
{stat.label}
))}

Keep Playing! üíï

Tag more players to increase your score and climb the leaderboard!

) } export default GameStats
